Yes, there are a few ways you can enjoy your cold brew without contributing to plastic waste. Here are some ideas:

1. Bring your own reusable metal or bamboo straw: This is a simple and effective way to eliminate plastic straws while enjoying your favourite iced beverages.

2. Choose cafes that are offering eco-friendly straws: Some cafes are already replacing plastic straws with paper straws or metal straws. Look out for these and choose cafes that are trying to make a difference.

3. Go for reusable cups: Many coffee shops now offer reusable cups made from eco-friendly materials such as bamboo or stainless steel. These cups come with reusable straws and are perfect for iced beverages.

4. Make your cold brew at home: If you are a big fan of iced coffee, you may want to consider investing in a reusable tumbler or cold brew bottle that comes with a built-in straw.

By implementing these tips, you can happily enjoy your cold brew without creating more plastic waste in our oceans.
